original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND b.UserId = c.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 20:21:15' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 18:12:10' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score<=61 AND p.ViewCount<=3627 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=5 AND p.CommentCount<=8 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND v.VoteTypeId=2 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-30 03:49:24' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 20:21:15' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 18:12:10'
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-30 03:49:24'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E6.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E6E3.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2 AND votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E6E3E4.PostId=E5.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 61 AND posts.ViewCount <= 3627 AND (CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 5) AND posts.CommentCount <= 8 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E4E5E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E6E3E4E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E6E3E4E5.PostId=E2.Id)
